attributes.action: stop this discrimination against owners/drivers of larger or 4x4 vehicles by suggesting higher tax levels, especially on the grounds of helping the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Properly maintained vehicles that pass MoT emission tests are as entitled to be on road as any other vehicle (remember this is a "free country"). Better to scrap current road tax and insurance charges and put a levy on fuel, so the more miles travelled, the more drivers pay. This should also apply to overseas HGV vehicles using UK roads which are often dirty and dangerous.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
